summary.description:
open source 2/3D morphometric software.

An ImageJ plugin for semi-automatic measurements of fossils (bivalves).

FossilJ is a plugin for fossil data acquisition by image analysis, using ImageJ.

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE '3DSlicer', '3D Slicer', 'ImageJ', 'Slicer', 'invest', 'morphometrics'
summary.name: FossilJ
